description: This header file declares internal functions for the Web Status Atom Table Object in a web server/client/application implementation. It primarily contains function prototypes related to status code phrase handling.

methods.name: WebSatoCreatePhraseTable
methods.description: Creates a phrase table for status codes within the Web Status Atom Table Object.

methods.name: WebSatoGetReasonPhrase
methods.description: Retrieves the reason phrase string associated with a specific status code.
